author: Silver Boomerang
comment: Making ya boy work the weekends is just a shame, let him go to the movies and dinner with the wife! Otherwise, great watchface, I feel like me and Herr Schmidt have a connection. He knows me.

author: Reza Rawassizadeh
comment: It is a very interesting and extremely innovative idea. Nevertheless there is a definite code improvement. The current version is heavily draining the battery. Hopefully, the next version is getting better.
title: Very innovative

author: Jenny Eldershaw
comment: I have only one complaint......no date! Or am I missing a setting somewhere?
title: Nice, but...

author: Rejane F
comment: It would be nice to see him doing some weekend activities but otherwise beautifully done watch face
title: Poor Mr Schmith

author: Ana Cepeda Santos
comment: Didn't test it yet on my watch but I'm using it on my phone and is absolutely adorable. It was easy to set up and works flawlessly
title: Adorable

author: Darlena Griffith
comment: Not compatible with 2.0

author: Andrea Cudin
comment: I love this watch face at the point that I opted for the paid version. It is simple and clean: very few options, but who cares when you can see Herr Schmidt throughout his day in these wonderful drawings! Disappointing are only the reviews, hundreds of 5 stars from people who don't seem to know the actual watch face.

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: Good point. We always ask people about their feedback. And you are right, most of the reviewers seem to want to do us a favor (or in some cases the opposite). Regardless of the motivation reasons, we really appreciate honest feedback by our users. So please let us know, if you got any further recommendations. Thank you.

title: Great face with suspect reviews

author: Al Perez
comment: Very classy and fun how Mr Schimt's daily routine matches mine. Hell I even look like him.
title: Mr schimt

author: Trent Fordham
comment: Simply amazing, and a great concept.   Brilliant.   Thank you for adding 12 hour time!   I love it!

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback. We will fix this with our next release. Thank you for your patience.

title: A work of art!

author: kiranv gowda143
comment: its very good Amazing!!!!

author: Bolt Magazine
comment: Amazing App and Watch is very Light... I love it.

author: Steve Duffy
comment: Great work the game is really interesting

author: Gapptech Net
comment: great app, i like this

author: Candy Pandy
comment: Simply exquisite design, I must say. I love how you can change not only the shape of the watch face, you can also change the background, which is cute little scenes like shown here. If you're looking for a nice, simple alternative watch app, don't hesitate with this one. I'm in love with this designer's way of turning it into something beautiful!

author: Sarah Meade
comment: I love the colors and textual look in the artwork.  You can let the designs shuffle or pick your favorite. The clockface can be round or square, plus you can resize on your home screen.  The clock works great!
title: Works great!

author: Alyssa Nainggolan
comment: I was seeking alternative clock widgets until I found this one. Very unique design! I can change the form to circular or square and also the background pictures. It's customizable. Would be great if there's option for changing fonts.
title: Love The Design

author: finally found
comment: Interesting and clear pictures, however it would be better with a date and day. And yes. The option to click on the time to show the date would be nice!

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: Please checkout release 1.3. We hope you like it.

title: Best if there's a date

author: Umar Siddiqi
comment: Love to be part of Mr. Schmidt's life every day. Makes me want to check the time again and again

author: Ted Miller
comment: Images are cute and well done... but at the same time creepy
title: The Truman Show

author: Vegan Organic GeminiSagitarius
comment: I love how this app doesn't need any personal information!
title: Amazing

author: Рада Цветковская
comment: This is one watch face that just keeps getting better and better.

author: Allen Ransome
comment: You can pretty much customize the whole watch face now. Love the new features!
title: Keeps getting better

author: Yvon Goodridge
comment: I have never bought a better watch face.. Moto 360 ....apart from his other's...
title: Excellent

author: Константин Уральских
comment: No question ask. This is a must. Be sure to check the community
title: Must have!

author: Blauvelt Vilas
comment: Best face I've found so far. Easily read with all essential day present.
title: Get it

author: Bob Bonsignore
comment: Great watch face, I love the aesthetic of the little worlds on the moto 360.
title: Beautiful!

author: Roger Burrowes
comment: Really love the look and the customization options. It's simple, minimal, and very neat.
title: Awesome!

author: Amelia Heron
comment: This face is very class. Color and other customization options are impressive. 5 ✨
title: Classy!

author: Борислав Осиповичев
comment: Looks superb on my Moto 360, and seems to be very good on battery life!
title: Fantastic

author: Алексей Якорев
comment: Works well. So many customization options. Now my primary watch face.
title: Great watchface

author: Татьяна Дедковская
comment: Simply the best android wear watch face ever. Love the customization options.
title: Excellent !

author: Amy Cockshaw
comment: Best watchface I've found. Loads of options, and very well crafted and presented.

author: Reece Debora
comment: Brilliant, smooth, and works like it should for my Moto 360. Thanks mate.
title: Fantastic

author: Phoebe Cullens
comment: It works, doesn't kill battery and is a different spin on 'digital
title: Nice

author: Halstead Drusilla
comment: Good operation, battery, wish it had more customizations and lines
title: Great face

author: Максим Клишанов
comment: My number one
title: Like

author: Robert Hellowell
comment: I love the customization you can do!
title: Great watch Face

author: Metcalfe Melva
comment: Just simply the best watch face suites my taste.
title: Love it

author: Dan Stany
comment: Very nice watch app with good graphics.
title: Pretty amazing watch
